data.message: somebody is logging in my account in othet devices and from location were i dont have friends or relatives ill be sending you the screen shot together with the i.p address of the said fb hacker.kindly please banned this i.p address so that he will not be able to hack other accounts

replies.message: Hey Luis. If you think someone has logged into your account without your permission, we recommend that you secure it right away. Learn how: http://bit.ly/2e7sfJh. -Joe
